00019 W.FGraph = function(args){var self = this;
00020     // control info.
00021     this.version = '0.0.1';
00022     this.name = 'FGraph';
00023     
00024     // handle arguments
00025     args = args?args:{};
00026     this.hideFirst = args.hideFirst?args.hideFirst:'';
00027     this.wps = args.wps?args.wps:'80%,80%,xcenter:0,ycenter:0';
00028 
00029     this.body = W.style('div');
00030     this.body.id = 'frame';
00031     if(this.hideFirst) this.body.display = 'none';
00032     
00033     this.origin = W.style('div', 'background:');
00034     this.origin.id = 'origin';
00035     this.origin.wps = '10,10,xcenter:0,ycenter:0';
00036     this.body.appendChild(this.origin);
00037     W.add(this);
00038     
00039     W.add(this.origin, this);
00040     // Add an "onload" event handler for the timer we're going to create below.
00041     var timer = new TimerControl();
00042     timer.initialize(1);
00043 
00044     // global
00045     graphui=new GraphUI();
00046     graphui.initialize(this.body, this.origin, false, true);
00047     
00048     // global
00049     graph=new Graph();
00050     graph.initialize( 400, 400 );
00051     graph.setUI(graphui);    
00052     timer.subscribe(graph);
00053 
00054     // global
00055     this.control = new UserControl();
00056     this.control.initialize(timer, graph, graphui);
00057     // perform init. arrangement
00058     this.control.resizeFrame();
00059     timer.start();        
00060 };

00068 W.FGraph.prototype.show = function(){
00069     this.body.display = 'block';
00070 };

00079 W.FGraph.prototype.getNode = function(id){
00080     return graphui.getNode(id);
00081 };

00095 W.FGraph.prototype.addNode = function(text, mass, fromOrig, edgeWeight, background, border){
00096     var node = this.control.addNode(text, mass?mass:2, fromOrig?fromOrig:true, edgeWeight);
00097     if(color && this.getNode( node.id ).style)
00098         this.getNode( node.id ).style.background = background?background:'';
00099     if(border && this.getNode( node.id ).style)
00100         this.getNode( node.id ).style.border = border?border:'';
00101     return node;
00102 };

00114     this.control.addEdge(from, to, weight);
00115 };
